name: A pair of magic infused grand pauldrons
data: It increases the users strength unbelievably much.
It decreases the users dexterity a good amount.
It increases the users constitution unbelievably much.
It increases the users wisdom unbelievably much.
It has tremendous armour class for its type (unbelievable in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration divinely.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users magical resistance superbly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
